name: Blue Ridge Aviation, LLC.
about: Blue Ridge Sport Flight LLC, located in Hendersonville, North Carolina, offers one-on-one accelerated flight training with a dedicated Master Level Gold Seal Flight Instructor, Greg Collins. With over 16,000 hours of instruction and a 95% first-time pass rate, Greg provides expert training for Private Pilot, Instrument, and other certifications. The school is situated at the Western North Carolina Air Museum Airport, featuring a 2700' private turf runway. Students benefit from exclusive use of training aircraft and accommodations on the airport, allowing for rapid progress in a short period. Greg's extensive experience and full-time commitment ensure students receive top-notch instruction, making Blue Ridge Sport Flight an ideal choice for those seeking efficient and high-quality flight training.
